title: Vest
description: applique floral design in green and faded red panels, back and front, on black; vented sides; extended collar; lined in black with red binding armhole and front sides and neck; black frog closings with knotted button top top; inside PL--rusty threaded needle (not removed); numbered tape on back lining at interior
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
